email_subject: RE: try this one for starters
email_body: Mac, This looks good. I won't know exactly what my cash position is until mid January. I will let you know. Thanks, Keith -----Original Message----- From: "Hargrove, Mac D [PVTC]" Sent: Tuesday, December 18, 2001 11:47 AM To: 'pallen@enron.com' Subject: FW: try this one for starters Phillip, This is our muni traders recommendation. Look it over and let me know what you think. Mac > ---------- > From: Martin, Deanna L [MSD] > Sent: Tuesday, December 18, 2001 11:23 AM > To: Hargrove, Mac D [PVTC] > Subject: try this one for starters > > <<1.pdf>> > let me know about questions. > Reminder: E-mail sent through the Internet is not secure. Do not use e-mail to send us confidential information such as credit card numbers, changes of address, PIN numbers, passwords, or other important information. Do not e-mail orders to buy or sell securities, transfer funds, or send time sensitive instructions. We will not accept such orders or instructions. This e-mail is not an official trade confirmation for transactions executed for your account. Your e-mail message is not private in that it is subject to review by the Firm, its officers, agents and employees. - 1.pdf << File: 1.pdf >>
